Reviews.Title: “Extremely Dirty, Smells Bad, Staff isnt helpful.”
Reviews.Author: Mikkel G
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel dubai looking expedia pictures ad nice hotel claim 4 star paid 100 usd night soon walked horrified smell reeked cooking bad kept spraying air fresheners probably worse dirtiest hotel ive stayed couches chairs stained caked onto extremely uncomfortable clean sheets fold couch didnt sleep head dirty floors visible splatter marks sticky cabinets super sticky literally red sauce splattered handles super sticky bathrooms towels toilet paper smelled horrible werent cleaned roof mold internet costs 15 usd night sooooo slow opinion dump allot restaurants 1520 minutes airport burj khalifa recommend

Reviews.Title: “Worst hotel ever”
Reviews.Author: Marco M
Reviews.Content: liked hotel bed else terrible clean expect 4 star hotel staff rude cant speak english location bad front mosque transmits prayers 247 giant annoying youre trying sleep worst toilet ive seen ive travelling months sleeping hostels definitively hotel dubai

Reviews.Title: “Good price - Bad Hotel”
Reviews.Author: Abs05
Reviews.Content: stayed april staff helpful front desk staff allow checkin late checkout thats bad soon entered hotel smell pungent smell cooking food restaurant lobby horrible smell inviting secondly noticed outdated unbelievably tv bed sofa seats linen curtains tour gym equipment 1980s pool refreshing hotel hotel situated mosque uncomfortable youre looking deep sleep overall day pleasure trip price inviting wouldnt im hotels worth price

Reviews.Title: “No hot water, unfriendly staff - but free parking”
Reviews.Author: prime01234
Reviews.Content: triple third bed sofa bed wornout mattress unfriendly staff envelope deposited wrong person name written bloody idiots bathroom moldy water medium pressure lukewarm alright nights free parking nice dubai

Reviews.Title: “GREAT HOTEL AND CHEAP”
Reviews.Author: keegan_9
Reviews.Content: stayed occasions location centre town handy metro beaches rooftop swimming rarely seen using staff helpful short cheap basic hotel trio recommend bed dubai dont
